name: Mushroom Run
description:
Introducing Mushroom run! Use the arrow keys to move and the space bar to Dash.

Chompies and Pumpkins do 1 damage. Chili does 2.

Thanks so much to Blackthornprod for the tutorial on unity. Enjoy.

Also I am aware that the walls are inside of the game view. If anyone knows a practical solution, lemme know please.
